bug.author: umesh-timalsina
bug.summary: ExecutionIndexWidget Throws an Error for Failed Executions
bug.description: After <denchmark-link:https://github.com/deepforge-dev/deepforge/pull/1329>#1329</denchmark-link> , Throws an error for failed executions. For executions with no metadata the widget should populate a text with or something similar rather than throwing an error. Possible Cause <denchmark-link:https://github.com/deepforge-dev/deepforge/blob/master/src/visualizers/panels/ExecutionIndex/ExecutionIndexControl.js#L53-L54>this block</denchmark-link> sends an undefined object to the widget which causes an error.
